body: I mean... just  break up with the guy already.  What's the point of staying in a relationship where you're not close to be into the guy? Break up, keep it professional, and officially move on wjth the shithead that needed to blackmail you to get you in  the sack... you know - the foundation of everything great coupling. But yeah - she should just break up with the producer and move on, it's a no brainer. But story gotta netorated, and since NTR is dumb... at least, the drawings are great.
